MAN.TITLE: realtime
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: set dates origin and time unit

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a real number. The number of seconds associated to the realtime argument
: a real number. A date relative to the origin set by realtimeinit

MAN.DESCRIPTION:
These two functions can be used to handle real time into Scilab.
realtimeinit(time_unit) set the date origin (t0) to the current date and defines the time unit associated to the realtime argument t
realtime(t) waits til date t0+t is reached.
